parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.16

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Curator

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Adds or changes curator camera area (depends on if ID is already used).

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> curatorObj '''addCuratorCameraArea''' [cameraAreaID,position,radius]
</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> [cameraAreaID,position,radius]: [[Array]]
</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> curatorObj: [[Object]] - Curator module.

</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> cameraAreaID: [[Number]]

</value></part><part><name>p4</name>=<value> position: [[Position]]

</value></part><part><name>p5</name>=<value> radius: [[Number]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>myCurator [[addCuratorCameraArea]] [3,[[position]] mySoldier,300];</code>

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[Arma 3: Curator]], [[removeCuratorCameraArea]], [[removeAllCuratorCameraAreas]], [[curatorCameraArea]]

</value></part><part><name>mp</name>=<value> Can be executed only on server
</value></part></template></root>
